law.history: Repealed 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 14, effective June 17, 1954. -- Created 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 3.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: State Tuberculosis Sanatoria Commission -- Appointment -- Terms -- Chairman -- Meetings -- Per diem -- Expenses -- Attachment to Department of Welfare -- Payment of expenses.
